titles.title: A resolution recognizing the measurable, positive impact that the National Committee for Quality Assurance has made on the quality of care patients in the United States have received during the 20 years since the formation of the organization.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Star Print ordered on the resolution.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 4/19/2010--Introduced. Recognizes: (1) the measurable, positive impact that the National Committee for Quality Assurance has made on the quality of care patients in the United States have received during the 20 years since that organization's formation; and (2) the importance of its continuing mission.
